song.eTitle: O COME, LET US SING UNTO THE LORD -- Psalm 95, KJV

verses.verse: O come, let us sing unto the Lord: let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation.
Let us come before his presence with thanksgiving, and make a joyful noise unto him, with psalms. For the Lord is a great God, and a great King above all gods.
In his hand are the deep places of the earth: the strength of the hills is his also. The sea is his, and he made it: and his hands formed the dry land.
O come, let us worship and bow down: let us kneel before the Lord our maker.
